Notice:
On 4/9/07 I will be deleting all of the .torrent files that are not getting so many hits. I have a computer running full time and its starting to really slow it down! I've just reached over 300GB seeded, I need the bandwidth for something useful, sorry!
--the_commenter--

This one is getting at least 13 hits per day... why would I remove it when it is actually being used? I removed 6 other torrents but I'm not going to remove this one. I only remove torrents because I'm seeding 387 of them and it gets a little confusing, and if no one is actually using them I'm not going to keep them for fun.

Hmm, doesnt work.

Tried to ld many diffrent LW pros, but I cant run them. Anything needed? Java?
